mention.text: the question of how to make loss-aware predictions in image segmentation settings where the evaluation function is the Intersection-over-Union -LRB- IoU -RRB- measure that is used widely in evaluating image segmentation systems
the Intersection-over-Union -LRB- IoU -RRB- measure that is used widely in evaluating image segmentation systems
two new methods that draw ideas from both existing approaches
